ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Service for General and Common Affairs of the Government of the Republic of Macedonia

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: Service for General and Common Affairs of the Government of the Republic of Macedonia

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Warranty for quality performance of the contract: (5.00 %)

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — statement of the economic operator stating that no effective verdict has been pronounced in the past 5 years for participation in criminal organisation, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— confirmation that no bankruptcy procedure has been initiated by a competent authority,
— confirmation that no liquidation procedure has been initiated by a competent authority,
— confirmation for paid taxes, contributions and other public fees from the authority competent in the country where the economic operator has been registered,

— confirmation from the Registry for penalties for committed criminal acts of the legal entities stating that no secondary penalty, ban on participation in open call procedures, on awarding of contracts for public procurement and contracts on public-private partnership has been pronounced,

— confirmation from the Registry for penalties for committed criminal acts of the legal entities stating that no secondary penalty, temporary penalty or permanent ban on the performance of particular activity has been pronounced,

— confirmation stating that no misdemeanour sanction – ban on the performance of the profession, activity or obligation, i.e. temporary ban on the performance of a particular activity has been pronounced with the effective verdict.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: The contracting authority shall use the electronic auction as the last stage in the procedure. The subject of the auction is the total price of the subject of the contract on public procurement, including all discounts, VAT excluded, i.e., the lowest price of the acceptable bids submitted during the initial phase of the procedure. The invitations for participation in the auction shall be submitted electronically, using the ESPP upon complete evaluation of the initial bids, to all economic operators that have submitted acceptable bids in the first stage of the procedure and are registered in the ESPP. The invitation to participate in the auction shall include the following information: the initial price of the auction, i.e. the lowest price of the initially submitted bids; the date and time of commencement and completion of the auction; as well as the interval in which to implement the negative bid (minimum and maximum difference in quotations). To be able to participate in the electronic auction, you must register in the ESPP.

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: The public opening of bids may be attended by any interested person.
Only authorised representatives of bidders may participate in the public opening of bids by giving their comments in the minutes of opening of bids.

Authorised representatives of the economic operators at the public opening must have authorisation signed by the responsible person of the economic operator. All authorised representatives of economic operators, attending the public opening, should sign an attendance list.
The tender documentation forms are attached to the announcement and are available to all interested bidders.
